name: PPDD Mac Edition
description:
This is an innovation fighting action game that you apply the counter-attack after avoiding the enemy's attack by the simple operation only with cross keys.
Since the enemy's attack sign is expressed visualiy,you'll not receive unreasonable damage and can avoid all attacks if you are an expert.
The moment you avoid the enemy attack,you enter "the Dodge Counter Moment" and can perform counter-attack.
In addition,you can perform the combo attack named "the Marshal blow" when the gauge is max.
